string.text: That you will tell, Barman...

Here that, Marked One... You Have pleased me, have brought documents from Agroprom... If it will be necessary to modify the armor, address! I can establish a various kind devices of night vision, and also strengthen suits, having raised, thereby, their wear resistance
Thanks, Barman, just that is necessary...
That you can offer from updatings of suits?
The Device of night vision...
On what suit to establish the device, on usual or already strengthened at me?
On the usual...
it is excellent... Choose suit model
